DDL.statement: CREATE TABLE `APP_PALLET_EXTENSION` ( `SSCC` varchar(18) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `FIRST_CASE_INPUT` varchar(1) NULL DEFAULT 'N', `FIRST_CASE_TIME` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `LAST_CASE_INPUT` varchar(1) NULL DEFAULT 'N', `LAST_CASE_TIME` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `SHIFT_ID` varchar(10) NULL DEFAULT '', `SUPPLIER_ID1` varchar(15) NULL DEFAULT '', `INCIDENT_REFERENCE` varchar(20) NULL DEFAULT '', `LOCATION` varchar(35) NULL DEFAULT '', `PRODUCT_GROUP` varchar(25) NULL DEFAULT '', `CONTAINER_CODE` varchar(12) NULL DEFAULT '', `PWEEK` int NULL DEFAULT 0, `PDAY` varchar(25) NULL DEFAULT '', `PMONTH` varchar(25) NULL DEFAULT '', `PYEAR` varchar(4) NULL DEFAULT '', `PALLET_QUANTITY` decimal(22, 3) NULL DEFAULT 0.000, PRIMARY KEY (`SSCC`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

CREATE TABLE `APP_PALLET_SAMPLES` ( `SSCC` varchar(18) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `SAMPLE_SEQUENCE` decimal(22, 0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `SAMPLE_DATE` datetime NULL DEFAULT NULL, `SAMPLE_REASON` varchar(15) NULL DEFAULT '', `DEFECT_TYPE` varchar(12) NULL DEFAULT '', `DEFECT_ID` varchar(12) NULL DEFAULT '', `LEAKING` varchar(1) NULL DEFAULT 'N', `COMMENT` varchar(80) NULL DEFAULT '', `SAMPLE_QUANTITY` decimal(22, 3) NULL DEFAULT 0.000, `USER_ID` varchar(20) NULL DEFAULT '', `SAMPLE_POINT` varchar(25) NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`SSCC`, `SAMPLE_SEQUENCE`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

CREATE TABLE `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` ( `DEFECT_ID` varchar(12) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `DESCRIPTION` varchar(40) NULL DEFAULT '', `LONG_DESCRIPTION` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT '', `DEFECT_TYPE` varchar(12) NULL DEFAULT '', `ENABLED` varchar(1) NULL DEFAULT 'Y', PRIMARY KEY (`DEFECT_ID`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

CREATE TABLE `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_TYPE` ( `DEFECT_TYPE` varchar(12) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `DESCRIPTION` varchar(40) NULL DEFAULT '', `LONG_DESCRIPTION` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `OUTPUT_COLUMN` int NULL DEFAULT 0, `LEAKING_DATA` varchar(1) DEFAULT 'Y', `NON_LEAKING_DATA` varchar(1) DEFAULT 'Y', `ENABLED` varchar(1) NULL DEFAULT 'Y', PRIMARY KEY (`DEFECT_TYPE`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

CREATE TABLE `APP_SUPPLIER` ( `SUPPLIER_ID` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `SUPPLIER_TYPE` varchar(12) NULL DEFAULT 'LAMINATE', `DESCRIPTION` varchar(80) NULL DEFAULT '', `ENABLED` varchar(1) NULL DEFAULT 'Y', PRIMARY KEY (`SUPPLIER_ID`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

CREATE ALGORITHM = UNDEFINED SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `view_pallet_samples` AS SELECT `app_pallet_samples`.`SSCC` AS `SSCC`, `app_pallet_samples`.`SAMPLE_SEQUENCE` AS `SAMPLE_SEQUENCE`, `app_pallet_samples`.`SAMPLE_DATE` AS `SAMPLE_DATE`, `app_pallet_samples`.`SAMPLE_REASON` AS `SAMPLE_REASON`, `app_pallet_samples`.`DEFECT_TYPE` AS `DEFECT_TYPE`, `app_pallet_samples`.`DEFECT_ID` AS `DEFECT_ID`, `app_pallet_samples`.`LEAKING` AS `LEAKING`, `app_pallet_samples`.`COMMENT` AS `COMMENT`, `app_pallet_extension`.`PALLET_QUANTITY` AS `START_QUANTITY`, `app_pallet_samples`.`SAMPLE_QUANTITY` AS `SAMPLE_QUANTITY`, `app_pallet_samples`.`SAMPLE_POINT` AS `SAMPLE_POINT`, `app_pallet_extension`.`FIRST_CASE_INPUT` AS `FIRST_CASE_INPUT`, `app_pallet_extension`.`FIRST_CASE_TIME` AS `FIRST_CASE_TIME`, `app_pallet_extension`.`LAST_CASE_INPUT` AS `LAST_CASE_INPUT`, `app_pallet_extension`.`LAST_CASE_TIME` AS `LAST_CASE_TIME`, `app_pallet_extension`.`SHIFT_ID` AS `SHIFT_ID`, `app_pallet_extension`.`SUPPLIER_ID1` AS `SUPPLIER_ID1`, `app_pallet_extension`.`INCIDENT_REFERENCE` AS `INCIDENT_REFERENCE`, `app_pallet_extension`.`LOCATION` AS `LOCATION`, `app_pallet_extension`.`PRODUCT_GROUP` AS `PRODUCT_GROUP`, `app_pallet_extension`.`CONTAINER_CODE` AS `CONTAINER_CODE`, `app_pallet_extension`.`PWEEK` AS `PWEEK`, `app_pallet_extension`.`PDAY` AS `PDAY`, `app_pallet_extension`.`PMONTH` AS `PMONTH`, `app_pallet_extension`.`PYEAR` AS `PYEAR`, `app_supplier`.`SUPPLIER_TYPE` AS `SUPPLIER_TYPE`, `app_supplier`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `SUPPLIER_DESCRIPTION`, `app_pallet`.`LOCATION_ID` AS `LOCATION_ID`, `app_pallet`.`MATERIAL` AS `MATERIAL`, `app_pallet`.`BATCH_NUMBER` AS `BATCH_NUMBER`, `app_pallet`.`PROCESS_ORDER` AS `PROCESS_ORDER`, `app_pallet`.`DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE` AS `DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE`, `app_pallet`.`STATUS` AS `PALLET_STATUS`, `app_pallet`.`MHN_NUMBER` AS `MHN_NUMBER`, `app_pallet`.`DECISION` AS `DECISION`, `app_sample_defect_type`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DEFECT_TYPE_DESCRIPTION`, `app_sample_defect_type`.`NON_LEAKING_DATA` AS `NON_LEAKING_DATA`, `app_sample_defect_type`.`LEAKING_DATA` AS `LEAKING_DATA`, `app_sample_defect_id`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DEFECT_ID_DESCRIPTION` FROM ((((( `app_pallet_samples` LEFT JOIN `app_pallet_extension` ON (( `app_pallet_samples`.`SSCC` = `app_pallet_extension`.`SSCC` ))) LEFT JOIN `app_supplier` ON (( `app_pallet_extension`.`SUPPLIER_ID1` = `app_supplier`.`SUPPLIER_ID` ))) LEFT JOIN `app_sample_defect_id` ON (( `app_pallet_samples`.`DEFECT_ID` = `app_sample_defect_id`.`DEFECT_ID` ))) LEFT JOIN `app_sample_defect_type` ON (( `app_pallet_samples`.`DEFECT_TYPE` = `app_sample_defect_type`.`DEFECT_TYPE` ))) LEFT JOIN `app_pallet` ON (( `app_pallet_samples`.`SSCC` = `app_pallet`.`SSCC` )))
CREATE ALGORITHM = UNDEFINED SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `view_sample_point_locations` AS select distinct `app_weight_sample_point`.`LOCATION` AS `Location` from `app_weight_sample_point`

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('BSF-01', 'Triple point fail', 'Fault at the triple point area either on the gusset or the side of the pouch where the side seal = 3mm.', 'BSF', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('BSF-02', 'Pouch foot seal incorrect', 'Pouch foot seal is either not present, partially formed or uneven.', 'BSF', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('CFL-01', 'Incorrect number', 'Incorrect number of pouches in Norreg box', 'CLF', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('CFL-02', 'Poor Placement', 'Pouches not aligned in the Norreg boxes', 'CLF', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('COD-01', 'Videojet Fault', 'The videojet code is either missing, incomplete, incorrect or poorly postioned (outside of the white box). ', 'COD', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('CUT-01', 'Cut', 'The pouch was damaged by something causing one or more cuts.', 'CUT', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('DIR-01', 'Secondary Contaminatio', 'The pouch is dirty (product residue present).', 'DIR', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('DMG-02', 'Crushed Corners', 'Crushed packaging due to position of the box on the corner of the pallet', 'DMG', 'Y');
INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('FRM-01', 'Unglued tabs', 'Cardboard tabs not glued correctly', 'FRM', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('IDX-01', 'Indexing', 'Pouch graphic is not alligned with cut off positio', 'IDX', 'Y');
INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('LAM-01', 'Delaminatio', 'Outer layer of pouch is coming off', 'LAM', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('PRO-01', 'Weight Under', 'The pouch has been inadequately filled (T2 violation) and not rejected by the checkweigher. For 100g products the weight is less than 91g and for 85g products the weight is less than 76g; Or the pouch is empty.', 'PRO', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('PRO-02', 'Weight Over', 'The pouch has been significantly overfilled and not rejected by the checkweigher. For 100 grams products the weight is more than 113g and for 85g products the weight is more than 96g.', 'PRO', 'Y');
INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('PRO-03', 'Empty Pouch', 'Totally empty pouch.', 'PRO', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('PUN-01', 'Punctured', 'The pouch was damaged by something causing one or more punctures', 'PU', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('PUN-02', 'Bird Damage', 'Pouch is pierced by birds beak in transport', 'PU', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('SLI-01', 'Incorrect Slitting', 'The slit cut is missing or too long/short or no alligned to the slit guide on the pack.', 'SLI', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('SSF-01', 'Narrow Side Seal', 'The side seal is below the critical limit <3mm.', 'SSF', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('TSF-01', 'Ultrasonic seal missing/incomplete', 'The ultrasonic seal is not present on the or the seal is incomplete (does not extend the full width of the pouch or is breached).', 'TSF', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('TSF-02', 'Ultrasonic seal creased', 'There is creasing or a crease extending through the pouch with significant amplitude.', 'TSF', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('TSF-03', 'Ultrasonic seal position miss-alignment', 'The ultrasonic seal is not located in the target postion. It is too close to the top of the pouch or it is formed at an angle.', 'TSF', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('TSF-04', 'Ultrasonic seal damaged', 'Ultrasonic seal is damaged and the aluminium layer of the laminate becomes visible or ultrasonic seal is split.', 'TSF', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('TSF-05', 'Thermal seal incomplete / missing', 'The thermal seal is either not present or does not seal the pouch completely.', 'TSF', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('TSF-06', 'Overlap', 'Visibility of the laminate. Overlap (laminate layer) greater than 3mm.', 'TSF', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('TSF-07', 'Folded Corner', 'The pouch has a folded corner or portion of the pouch is folded over.', 'TSF', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('TSF-08', 'Ultrasonic seal Aluminium Visible', 'There is Aluminium visible in the ultrasonic seal area', 'TSF', 'Y');
INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('TSF-09', 'Creased', 'There are creases in the Top Seal', 'TSF', 'Y');

INSERT INTO `APP_SAMPLE_DEFECT_ID` (`DEFECT_ID`, `DESCRIPTION`, `LONG_DESCRIPTION`, `DEFECT_TYPE`, `ENABLED`) VALUES ('WET-01', 'Wet Pouch', 'Visible water on the pouches in the Norreg boxes.', 'WET', 'Y');
